column3: â€œSmoked this with my Nana and great Uncle Pete while on winter vacation. Very nice stuff. Got me high pretty quickly and I didn't really feel any negatives. 8/10 would recommend. Good with helping aches and pains and soreness. Made me forget how much my back hurt from sleeping on an air mattress. It also helps lower my stress level from seeing family I don't normally see and actually talking with them.â€

â€œOh. My. God.

Got a half O from a friend and I rolled up three proper fatties, and in the fattest of the 3, I put probably about half a gram of kief from the last 3 months I've saved up.

Gotta tell ya, this is some quality shit. Great strain, heaviness in back of eyes, euphoric body and head high. Taking me a while to type this. My ribs feel warm and fuzzy.â€

â€œThis is an aromatic blend that has notes of cedar, lemon and apple ... a really wonderful taste through my Davinci Ascent (typically use a Volcano but the Ascent is easy and portable).     The vapor at 350 degrees is hardly discernable ... but don't be fooled, the high rises quickly and for me, a small dose (half-filled Ascent chamber and 3-4 draws) is just perfect.

The high is super quick and very mellow.    The ta...â€

â€œI have multiple health issues CFIDS, Fibromyalgia,  multiple ruptured discs with spinal impinging and after 8yrs of being sick and the medical community unable to help me I tried Cannabis. I would have tried it sooner but it's illegal in this state.
I prefer Sativa strains because they provide me with the ability to deal with the depression,  chronic physical pain, muscle spasms, and give me a bit of energy, I normal...â€

â€œSour Lemon OG is one of my favorite og's. The smell is very strong. The smoke is a big hitter that hits the head real quick. With the onset of the body high immediately a creative buzz unites for a lingering experience that won't disappoint.â€
â€œLight sweet high. I feel like I can focus on anything! FUCK RITALIN- LEMON OG!â€

â€œSurprisingly sour aftertaste that follows its very lemon taste with a mix of lime up front. Very pungent and about 70% sativa dominant for that energetic and uplifted high that can be channeled into a creative or motivated episode to help you get sh*t done. I use this for during the day to help me focus on my work and keep my scatter brain in check.â€

â€œPicked up some live sugar and shatter wax of this strain.  Tasty, citrusy flavor. Felt like I had a ton of energy and was super focused.  Made me a bit chatty...  Great smoke for a day outside or if you just need to clean the house.â€

â€œFirst off this bud smells absolutely amazing. When the bud tender showed me this I knew I had to get it. Boy this strain lived up to its og standards. Its perfect lemon sour taste like a lemon drop. Great head high for sure! Also some indica so it got me chill.â€

â€œThis strain is absolutely delicious.

First, the smell: simply crisp and clean, evoking a sensation of clearheadedness.

Next, the smoke - also very clean, not too dry.

The high is stimulating, but not speedy. It is relaxing, but not groggy or prone to couch lock.

I appreciate a creativity boost and a proneness toward action and spontaneity.

Some things I noted: a moderate, but not extreme, increase in paranoia, b...â€

â€œLove this strain.  Quick hitting and feels like a sativa.  Come down is nice and relaxing without the couch lock.  Think lighter than OG Kush or Gorilla Glue #4.  Mood shifter for sure.  Sometimes I also get an out of body experience... which is cool for me.  Would love to take this while at a dance club or making out.  :)   It will also kick out headaches in a flash.â€

â€œHoly wow, got 7 grams of this super sticky, gummy, amazingly scented wax and two small dabs later I'm slack-jawed and staring at my TV screen. Surprised by a low-moderate munchies craving, I had wobbly legs and an incredibly satisfied mindset, crawled into bed and slept beautifully. The stickiness could definitely be a pain but once in a suitable container it's no longer an issue. Highly recommended!â€

â€œThis wonderful lemony OG is the palate cleanser both in the way it taste and the effect on the body.
